alert.note: Alert for Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 1:16PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Malheur County through 300 PM MDT... At 216 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monumental Rock, or 47 miles northwest of Rome, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monumental Rock, Mosquito Mountain, Swamp Creek Buttes, Red Butte and Monument Peak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
